messages.content: Dear Voter, Almost half of us in Mitcham & Morden voted to leave the EU, yet I am the only major party candidate who campaigned for it here. Only UKIP can be trusted to deliver Brexit.

A proud Merton resident, I've been one of the highest profile opposition voices locally. I was a Lower Morden Councillor for 4 years during which I campaigned for St Helier hospital and opposed cuts to frontline services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Immigration system fair for all; Border and coastal security reinstated.
Recruit 20,000 Police and 20,000 Soldiers; Rebuild our Armed Forces.
Fund 20,000 nurses and 10,000 GPs; Scrap hospital parking fees.
One legal system for all; Defending hard-won equality and free speech.
Full Brexit; Abolish the House of Lords; English Parliament; Proportional Representation.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Almost half of us in Mitcham & Morden voted to leave the EU.

housing.content: Selling off our housing stock to foreign buyers

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigned for St Helier hospital and opposed cuts to frontline services.

quotes.text: Jeremy Corbyn and his Labour party are in a death spiral. They no longer represent ordinary, hard-working people and are run by an Islington-based clique. A vote for Labour is a vote for: Uncontrolled mass immigration, Remaining in the crumbling European Union, Selling off our housing stock to foreign buyers, Making you pay to see your doctor, Abolishing our nuclear deterrent.

images.caption: Richard Hilton, UKIP candidate for Mitcham & Morden
